row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
row.description: Build Java arguments using specified array.

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_ACTION_SPECIFIC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS ! Load Package parameter :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS ! Add read timeout, connection timeout to java arguments : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-readtimeout") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_HPQC_READ_TIMEOUT#")
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-connectiontimeout") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_HPQC_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#")
